versions.name: Cats Blender Plugin 4.5.0.0
versions.description: Alpha version for Blender 4.5. Both Blender 4.5 and this version of Cats Blender Plugin are in early Alpha stage.
versions.warning: WARNING: Both Blender 4.5 and this version of Cats Blender Plugin are in early Alpha stage. Expect bugs, crashes, and other issues during usage.

versions.name: Cats Blender Plugin 4.4.1.1
versions.warning: Known Incompatible Addons: Official Cats Blender Plugin and MMD Tools may cause conflicts as this version includes its own MMD Tools implementation.

versions.name: Cats Blender Plugin 4.3.2.1
versions.warning: This version has reached End-of-Life (EOL) status and will no longer receive updates. Known Incompatible Addons: Official Cats Blender Plugin and MMD Tools may cause conflicts.

versions.name: Cats Blender Plugin 4.2.3.1
versions.description: Blender 4.2 is the next Blender Long Term Support (LTS) release, and the unofficial Cats add-on fully supports this version with enhanced features and stability improvements.
versions.warning: Known Incompatible Addons: Official Cats Blender Plugin and MMD Tools may cause conflicts as this version includes its own MMD Tools implementation.

versions.name: Cats Blender Plugin 4.1.2.4
versions.description: The unofficial Cats add-on for Blender 4.1 provides full compatibility and enhanced features for your avatar creation needs.
versions.warning: This version has reached End-of-Life (EOL) status and will no longer receive updates. Known Incompatible Addons: Official Cats Blender Plugin and MMD Tools may cause conflicts.

versions.name: Cats Blender Plugin 4.0.5.2
versions.description: Stable release for Blender 4.0. For Blender 4.x versions, we recommend using the unofficial Cats add-on for Blender 4.1, which is still actively maintained.
versions.warning: This version has reached End-of-Life (EOL) status and will no longer receive updates. Known Incompatible Addons: Official Cats Blender Plugin and MMD Tools.

versions.name: Cats Blender Plugin 3.6.8.3
versions.description: Blender 3.6 LTS offers two support options: the unofficial Cats add-on (recommended) and the official Cats add-on.
versions.warning: This version has reached End-of-Life (EOL) status. Known Incompatible Addons: Official Cats Blender Plugin and MMD Tools may cause conflicts.
